title: JSON Schema for MetaMask Snaps snap.manifest.json

version.title: Snap's version in SemVer format
version.description: Must be the same as in package.json

proposedName.title: Snap author's proposed name for the snap
proposedName.description: The wallet may display this name in its user interface

description.title: A short description of snap
description.description: The wallet may display this description in its user interface

repository.title: Git repository with snap's source code
repository.description: Specify the place where your code lives. This is helpful for people who want to contribute.

source.title: Snap's runtime files
source.description: Information needed to load and execute the snaps' code

shasum.title: Checksum of runtime files
shasum.description: Checksum composed from all the files that are loaded during runtime

location.title: Location of the snap runtime code
location.description: Points to a single JavaScript file which will be run under Snaps sandbox

npm.title: Runtime file location in Npm
npm.description: Information on how to locate the runtime file in an Npm package

filePath.title: Runtime code filepath
filePath.description: Unix-style location of the JavaScript source file relative to root of the Npm package

packageName.title: Npm package name
packageName.description: The name of the npm package. Currently required to be the same one as the one containing the manifest.

iconPath.title: Snap icon filepath
iconPath.description: Optional path of .svg icon that will be shown to the user in the UI

registry.title: Npm registry
registry.description: URL pointing to Npm registry used to load the package

initialPermissions.title: Snap permissions
initialPermissions.description: Permissions requested by the snap from the user

manifestVersion.title: snap.manifest.json version
manifestVersion.description: The version of this file used to detect compatibility
